channel.title: CVE Feed for Wyze -- Cam Pan v2
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Wyze -- Cam Pan v2

item.title: CVE-2019-9564|2024-09-16T23:01:19.046Z -- wyze -- cam%20pan%20v2
item.description: A vulnerability in the authentication logic of Wyze Cam Pan v2, Cam v2, Cam v3 allows an attacker to bypass login and control the devices. This issue affects: Wyze Cam Pan v2 versions prior to 4.49.1.47. Wyze Cam v2 versions prior to 4.9.8.1002. Wyze Cam v3 versions prior to 4.36.8.32.
